outline:
1. to lie down
    1. (Qal)
      1. to lie, lie down, lie on
      2. to lodge
      3. to lie (of sexual relations)
      4. to lie down (in death)
      5. to rest, relax (fig)
    2. (Niphal) to be lain with (sexually)
    3. (Pual) to be lain with (sexually)
    4. (Hiphil) to make to lie down
    5. (Hophal) to be laid
kjv_def: [idiom] at all, cast down, (lover-)lay (self) (down), (make to) lie (down, down to sleep, still with), lodge, ravish, take rest, sleep, stay.
strongs_def: to lie down (for rest, sexual connection, decease or any other purpose)
